code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Leaderboard(){const[gangs,setGangs]=useState([]);const csvUrl="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vT3xiYNiWQcKMZoFWNIegC2z1B04UjqRLNVE2Tlyxh43ew9a_UkDegQEPu2Qph_8q1cnd61QeMDnHK5/pub?gid=0&single=true&output=csv";useEffect(()=>{fetch(csvUrl).then(res=>res.text()).then(csvText=>{const[headerLine,...lines]=csvText.trim().split("\n");const headers=headerLine.split(",").map(h=>h.trim());const data=lines.map(line=>{const values=line.split(",");const item={};headers.forEach((h,idx)=>{const raw=values[idx];item[h]=isNaN(+raw)?raw:+raw;});return item;});const sorted=data.sort((a,b)=>b["Points"]-a["Points"]);setGangs(sorted);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-3xl w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-5xl font-extrabold text-center text-white mb-10",children:"Gang Wars Leaderboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl bg-gray-900",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between bg-gray-800 py-4 px-6 font-bold text-gray-300 uppercase tracking-wide text-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Gang Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Points"})]}),gangs.map((gang,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between py-4 px-6 ".concat(index%2===0?"bg-gray-800":"bg-gray-700"," text-white text-lg"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:gang["Gang Name"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-semibold",children:gang["Points"]})]},index))]})]});}
